name: Chicken, Grape, and Rice Salad
author: Tara
summary: My neighbor made this for a picnic forever ago, and it is super easy to make. Easy to change it your own liking. Sometimes the onions can be too strong, so you may want to test before adding too many.
ingredients: 1 (5 ounce) package long grain and wild rice mix (such as Mahatma®)
½  red onion, chopped, or to taste
1 ½ cups seedless red grapes, quartered
directions: Bring water and margarine to a boil in a saucepan; reduce heat to low and stir in long grain and wild rice mix
Cover and simmer until rice is tender, about 25 minutes
Fluff with fork and allow rice mix to cool thoroughly
Mix cooled rice mix with chicken, red onion, grapes, cashews, and mayonnaise
Serve immediately or chill before serving
